long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Name: BiLingo Toggle

Short description: Easily toggle between Hebrew and English, and switch between uppercase and lowercase.

Detailed description: BiLingo Toggle is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you switch between Hebrew and English text and toggle between uppercase and lowercase with ease. This extension is perfect for bilingual users who frequently work with both Hebrew and English text.

Key features:

Toggle the case of selected text with a keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+U or Command+Shift+U on Mac) or via the context menu.
Switch the language of selected text between Hebrew and English using a keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+L or Command+Shift+L on Mac) or the context menu.
How to use:

Select the text you want to modify.
Right-click to access the context menu and choose "Toggle Case" or "Toggle Language", or use the corresponding keyboard shortcuts.
The selected text will be updated based on your chosen action.
BiLingo Toggle is designed to work with various input fields, including Gmail's mail body, making it an ideal tool for users who frequently switch between languages or need to change the case of their text.

Privacy:
This extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information. All text processing is done locally within your browser.

Support:
If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvements, please contact the developer at info@nachum.io.

Version: 1.0

Category: Productivity
